resources.string: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consetetur sadipscing elitr, sed diam nonumy eirmod tempor invidunt ut labore et dolore magna aliquyam erat, sed diam voluptua.
An error occurred while decoding the api response
No message provided, type of error was %s
A hostname could not be resolved. Please check your connectivty.
Looks like you are not signed in (or banned)
A programming error occurred. I am very sorry.
The app ran of memory. I am working on that.
A timeout occurred during a network request.
Looks like pr0gramm is not available right now. Send a complaint to cha0s.
You are saving a lot of traffic, but loading of an yet unconverted gif might take a moment longer. If conversion did not work, the app will fall back to loading the gif.
Login not successful. Did you check your password? You might be temporarily banned if you failed to login too often.
New update available. Short overview about what is new: %s
Reduces traffic on gifs by up to 90%!
Deactivating this will make the life of the developer harder!
Sends anonymous crash reports on errors
Display not safe for life posts (requires login)
Display not safe for work posts (requires login)
Stores gif into a temporary file
Loads gif in memory. Might produce memory errors on old devices.
Select higher value for better quality with \'musste scrollen\' images
Might be less stable, but no restart on rotation
More stable, but restarts video on rotation
Specifies the style how already viewed items are marked in the feed
Plays a small animation if you vote something
Plays no animation if you vote something
Your system ran out of memory while downloading the gif. You should activate downloading of gifs to a temporary file in the settings.
A network error occurred. Just try again.
Type a new tag to add to the post. You can separate multiple tags with a comma.
Are you sure to logout? Your benis history will be deleted and can not be restored.
You need to restart the app for this setting to take effect.
This is your personal benis graph. It shows the changes in your benis in the past seven days.
Double tap on an image or video performs an upvote
Activate this for smaller vote buttons on comments
The benis graph shows changes to your benis in the last seven days.
Can not load the feed. Please try again.
Check this to remove the status and navigation bar in the fullscreen image viewer.
Tap here to show the changelog dialog
Tap here to check for updates
This is the latest version. There is no new update.
Do you want to remove this bookmark?
If you disable this option, the pin-button to create bookmarks will not be displayed. This affects just the button, not your bookmarks.
Please wait while performing login and while syncing your votes
If you activate beta channel, you get new updates earlier.
You are on the beta channel. Please inform me if something is not working correctly. You can send feedback by going to the settings menu.
Looks like there was some problem with your login cookie. This shouldn\'t happen, and maybe cha0s changed something at the pr0gramm api level.
If enabled, a separate button for refresh will be displayed.
Show notifications on new messages or comments.
Tags can now be voted by long pressing the tag! Try it out!
Could not play video. Try the compatibility settings and if you still can\'t play any videos, please report logcat to Mopsalarm (see settings, at the bottom).
Logfile was created at %s. Please send this to Mopsalarm.
Error 262 occurred during video playback. A logfile was created at %s. Please send this to Mopsalarm to help fix this bug.
Could not play video because of a network error.
Activate this if you have problems playing webm videos
Keeps the screen on while looking at posts and comments
Behaviour settings like double tap to vote, notifications and other stuff.
Customize how some parts of the app should look like.
Something is not working? Check here!
Do you have something to hide?
Caching is good to save bandwidth and to speed up loading of previously seen images and videos. Deactivate this, if you can\'t see any images.
Confirm playback of videos and gifs on mobile to conserve bandwidth.
Show an animation on the post while voting
Automatically load hq version of image in zoom view, if available.
Hide the little vote buttons on tags. You can make them visible by long-tapping the tag.
Show more tags of an image in multiple lines at once.
This is a short dummy text that has abou 10 words.

string-array.name: upload_small_print
string-array.item: nsfw/nsfl Bilder müssen vor dem Upload entsprechend markiert werden!
Keine suggestiven Bilder oder Gore von/mit Minderjährigen/Babys/Föten.
Keine Tierpornos. Kein stumpfer Rassismus, kein rechtes Gedankengut, keine Nazi-Nostalgie.
Keine Werbung; keine Affiliate Links in den Bildern; kein Spam.
Keine Informationen oder Bilder von Privatpersonen; Keine Klarnamen in den Uploads, Tags oder Kommentaren.
Ein Mindestmaß an Bildqualität wird erwartet. Bildmaterial mit starken Kompressionsartefakten, übermäßig großen Watermarks oder unsinnig beschnittene/skalierte Bilder werden gelöscht.
Keine Bilder mit ähnlichem Inhalt in Reihe.
Zugehöriger Content kann in den Kommentaren verlinkt werden.
Kommentare wie “Tag deinen Scheiß” und ähnliches gehören nicht in die Tags. Genaueres im FAQ: Was gehört in die Tags?
Downvote-Spam, Vote-Manipulation und Tag-Vandalismus werden nicht geduldet.
Pro Benutzer ist nur ein Account erlaubt. Indizien für Multiaccounts sind gegenseitige Upvotes oder Spamaktionen.
Keine Warez, gestohlene Logins zu Pay Sites o.ä

resources.string: Unfähigkeit, diese Regeln zu befolgen, wird mit einer Sperrung Deines Accounts honoriert. Diskussionen um die Sperrung werden die Sperrung verlängern.
Warning, right now, only uploading images is supported and highly experimental. Please send Feedback.
Limit for today is reached. You need to wait until you are allowed to do another upload (a longer benis is required alternatively!)
This image is blacklisted from pr0gramm.
Internal error - cha0s fucked up here.
The image is invalid. Maybe too large?
Download of your image url failed.
This upload already exists. I have just saved you from a repost. Say thanks.
An unknown error occurred during upload.
Best thing to do is just to try again.
Use encrypted connections for all connections to pr0gramm. This is more secure but might be slower or unstable right now.
Use a software decoder for video playback. This should help if video playback is not working for you.
Enable this option to enhance your feed. This enables for example the \"repost\" hint in the feed.
